creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wellington Lee
description: standing figure rowing a boat at LRC; tall land forms reflected in water with trees and partially hidden buildings on opposite bank; Peoples Republic of China
markings: \'ON THE LI RIVER\', in pencil, on back; \'#A-27\', in black ink, on back; \'WELLINGTON LEE/HON PSA, FPSA, FRPS, HON EFIAP, HON EPSNY/60 CONTINENTAL AVE./FOREST HILLS, N.Y. 11375, U.S.A.\', stamped on back; \'#1\', in pencil, on back; \'Wellington Lee\', in black ink, on back; \'PTA Int. Exhibition of Photography\' sticker, on back
title: On the Li River
